voice.name: en-US-JennyMultilingualNeural
voice.prosody: I see that you have an interest in that precious vessel. It is called terra sigillata. It came from the workshops of the Grausenfrenque, in Condatomagus. In Roman times ceramics were manufactured in huge centralized workshops that supplied the entire empire, in the style of current industrial manufacturing. The workshops of southern Gaul replaced the Italians in the time of Augustus. These made the famous aretine pottery that was exported throughout the empire. Do you want to know a curiosity?.
